title: Roxanne Pallett locks lips with beefcake fireman boyfriend on romantic break in Maldives
text:

Looks like Roxanne Pallett is getting a real lift from her beefcake fireman boyfriend, locking lips in the pool on a romantic holiday in the Maldives.

The ex-Emmerdale star, 36, has rarely been seen since becoming public enemy No1 after her stint on Celebrity Big Brother .

But hot New York fireman and wrestling champ Jason Carrion, 32, is proving to be an adequate distraction from the drama.

Jason will be showing off his moves next week across England, defending his LDN wrestling belt.

They reportedly met by chance in Brooklyn , New York, when she got out of a cab across the road from him and seemed to be lost.

(Image: BACKGRID)

Roxanne’s romance comes after her split with former fiance Lee Walton and just months after Jason divorced former partner Cortney Hendrix in February.

Roxanne became public enemy number one after she exaggerated a playful punch from Ryan Thomas in Celebrity Big Brother last year.

(Image: BACKGRID)

Ryan ended up winning CBB, while Roxanne went into hiding a sought therapy over her “issues”.

But she’s all smiles now....for rather obvious reasons. Phwoar!
description: The loved-up pair enjoyed a swimming pool smooch in the Maldives ahead of Jason defending his LDN champion wrestling belt in England next week
